scripts.dev:bg: rm -f vite.log vite.pid && (vite > vite.log 2>&1 & echo $! > vite.pid) && echo Started Vite in background PID $(cat vite.pid)
scripts.stop:bg: if [ -f vite.pid ]; then kill $(cat vite.pid) 2>/dev/null || true; rm -f vite.pid; echo Stopped Vite background process; else echo No vite.pid found; fi
